title: Final Competition Worlds Quite Different from Test Worlds?

content.html:
@chapulina Could you elaborate on your statement from Issue 196? I keep hearing implications that in the test worlds we are not seeing the full variability that might appear in the final worlds.

Ah so I think you didn't see the issue on the other tasks because they happened to be aligned with the world. But don't count on this, because during the finals, they will probably have different orientations on each world.

This particular statement implies, IMO, that while the test worlds are all facing the +X axis that this may not be the case in the final worlds. If so, how do we create worlds for testing? How can we create worlds for testing the other parameters that may be different?
